actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Water and Power Resources.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water and Power Resources

official_title: A bill to declare that certain costs incurred for emergency repairs and modifications to preserve the safety of the Conconully Dam are nonreimbursable and nonreturnable.

summary.text: Declares that certain costs incurred in 1969 for emergency repairs and modifications to preserve the safety of Conconully Dam, Okanogan Unit, Okanogan-Similkameen Division, Chief Joseph Dam Project, Washington, are nonreimbursable and nonreturnable.

titles.title: A bill to declare that certain costs incurred for emergency repairs and modifications to preserve the safety of the Conconully Dam are nonreimbursable and nonreturnable.
